comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.facebook.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2F) ### Comment > With Adguard enabled Meta apps (Facebook or Instagram) does not work properly. Pages are basically un-usable, content is not loading. When Adguard is disabled it works normally again. I believe the problem is with DNS, I'm paying for the Adguard DNS, so I have dedicated DNS address configured in the Adguard app on the PC and on the router itself. When I use standard DNS I don't see the issue, when I use Adguard DNS on either router or the PC then I see the issue with Meta apps. I have the main domains like facebook.com or instagram.com whitelisted, but that's not helping. Also, I've cleared DNS cache on PC and that's not helping either. I can reproduce the same problem on two different networks with different computers on them. ### Screenshots
